TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScriptMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies whether and objects refer to the debug or release version of client scripts.

span.span: Specifies whether and objects refer to the debug or release version of client scripts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉來設定要使用在網頁上的用戶端指令碼的版本會提供值。The enumeration provides values for setting the version of client script to use on a Web page. 列舉值可套用至屬性或[ScriptReference.ScriptMode]()屬性。The enumeration values can be applied to either the property or to the [ScriptReference.ScriptMode]() property. 物件會設定頁面上的所有指令碼的版本會覆寫它，除非物件。The object sets the version for all scripts on the page unless it is overridden by a object. 物件設定特定的指令碼的版本。The object sets the version for a particular script. 值產生不同的結果，根據它參考到獨立的指令碼檔案或組件中內嵌為資源的指令碼檔案。The value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 獨立的指令碼檔案以定義[ScriptReference.Path]()屬性。A standalone script file is defined with the [ScriptReference.Path]() property. 組件參考必須透過和屬性。An assembly reference must be accessed through the and properties. 結果值如下：The results for the value are as follows: - 套用到獨立的指令碼檔案時，[ScriptReference.Path]指定屬性，值相當於。When it is applied to a standalone script file where the [ScriptReference.Path] property is specified, the value is equivalent to . - 當它套用到組件中的指令碼參考相當於。When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, is equivalent to . 只有當指定，它用來參考指令碼。When only is specified, it is used to reference the script. 當和 [ScriptReference.Path]屬性都是這兩個指定，[ScriptReference.Path]而不是使用屬性，但值等於仍。When and the [ScriptReference.Path] property are both specified, the [ScriptReference.Path] property is used instead of , but the value is still equivalent to . 如果指令碼之要求的版本不存在，則會擲回錯誤。An error is thrown if the requested version of the script does not exist. 比方說，如果名為 CustomScript.js 獨立指令碼檔案建立的參考會擲回錯誤而屬性設定為，但 CustomScript.debug.js 站台上不存在。For instance, an error is thrown if a reference is made to a standalone script file that is named CustomScript.js and the property is set to , but CustomScript.debug.js does not exist on the site. 如果偵錯版本不存在的組件中的指令碼的參考就會傳回發行版本。References to scripts in an assembly return the release version if the debug version does not exist. > [!NOTE] > 當`retail`屬性[部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc)Machine.config 檔案的元素設定為`true`，用戶端指令碼的發行版本中使用的網站。When the `retail` attribute of the [deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc) element of the Machine.config file is set to `true`, the release versions of client scripts are used throughout the Web site. 值和[ScriptReference.ScriptMode]()屬性會被忽略。The values in the and [ScriptReference.ScriptMode]() properties are ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示頁面之指令碼版本以宣告方式設定為發行版本控制項，但一個名為 CustomClient.js 的指令碼以宣告方式設定為在偵錯控制項。The following example shows a page where the script versions are declaratively set to Release in the control, but one script named CustomClient.js is declaratively set to Debug in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptMode/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptMode/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ScriptMode Auto = int32(0)

summary.span: In the control, the version of client scripts to use is determined at run time based on the application-level [<compilation>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) element of the Web.config file, unless it is overridden in an instance of the control.

span.span: In the control, the version of client scripts to use is determined at run time based on the application-level [<compilation>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) element of the Web.config file, unless it is overridden in an instance of the control.

summary.span: In the control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden in an instance of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ScriptMode Release = int32(3)

summary.span: In the control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden by setting the property of a instance to .

span.span: In the control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden by setting the property of a instance to .

summary.span: In the control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page.
